attributes.action: get out of paliment and take his useless cronies with him
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this country has gone down hill faster than an olimpic skier since labour came to power public transport is rubbish not that he would know as he never uses it.the motorist pays through the nose to prop up every thing else and the roads are dangerous with every ultility company digging them up and not reinstating them properly i could go on but then i would be as boring as brown is just hurry up and call an election
